# Average across all neighbors

```{r gene-score-all-cells, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}


gene.score = bplapply(genes, function(current.gene){
  current.atlas = counts.atlas[rownames(counts.atlas) == current.gene,]
  current.mapping = mapping[grepl(paste0( current.gene, "_"), rownames(mapping)),]
  current.mapping.atlas = mapping.atlas[grepl(paste0( current.gene, "_"), rownames(mapping.atlas)),]
  
  # real 
  stat.all = lapply(1:nrow(current.mapping), function(current.neighbor){
    
    tab = table(current.mapping[current.neighbor, ])
    cells = names(tab)
    df = data.frame(atlas = current.atlas[cells], imputed = apply(current.mapping.atlas[, cells] , 2, function(x) mean(current.atlas[x]) ) )
  
    weighted_corr <- cov.wt(df, wt = as.numeric(tab), cor = TRUE)
    out = data.frame( gene = current.gene, neighbor = current.neighbor, score = as.numeric( weighted_corr$cor[1,2]))
  })
  stat.all = do.call(rbind, stat.all)
  return( stat.all )
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
gene.score = do.call(rbind, gene.score)
saveRDS(gene.score, file =  paste0( root.dir, "data/8_5/stitching/geneScore_embryo1z2.rds"))


```
